title: When a Yasuo kills you under tower and escapes with low health, but you're Karthus with ult off CD.

replies.body:
Then you realize that Yasuo's shield passive is ready...

http://orig02.deviantart.net/a0d5/f/2015/230/5/2/aku_by_lk3deviantart-d967gmj.gif

http://33.media.tumblr.com/edacc14f9d6cd8d887595dba7ba4ad4f/tumblr_mltyhtrxcR1r76ek7o1_400.gif
Damn.

> [{quoted}](name=Devack The Holy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=j97qrhxB,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-12-03T21:41:23.078+0000)
>
> Then you realize that Yasuo's shield passive is ready...
> 
> http://orig02.deviantart.net/a0d5/f/2015/230/5/2/aku_by_lk3deviantart-d967gmj.gif

https://cdn0.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/FhcChfRMtaB3GugSo3WVILhgAvE=/cdn0.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/4316999/SamuraiJack.0.gif

And then you laugh, because it's still not enough. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tgdu4ZXDjZo

Then his GA goes off:

http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Forig02.deviantart.net%2Fa0d5%2Ff%2F2015%2F230%2F5%2F2%2Faku_by_lk3deviantart-d967gmj.gif&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=150

Played Karthus the other day
I will admit, the first time I died and used my ult to secure two kills late in the game, I typed in all chat
"HELLO FROM THE OTHER SIIIIIIDE"

...No regrets
{{champion:16}} Hello. How are you today?
Doing quite well with my {{item:3165}} and 900 damage ult
Doesn't work on outside healing anymore :c
It never worked on Soraka's ult anyways.
Touche
{{champion:6}}- "Did you ever make it out of that town where nothing ever happens?"  {{champion:14}}- "Yup."
Blood Moon Karthus needs to be a thing, and Aku must be the reference for it.
Have an evil cookie.
Wait what is this from? I vaguely remember this show.
Samurai Jack
It's coming back for a new season.
REALLY?!?!? When did they announce this and when will it be back?

Literally yesterday.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzIxLwVwtiQ
And if I remember correctly, it's toonnami or adult swim!
On Adult Swim. Hoping for it to be a little more intense as a result :3

One of the best shows ever.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e51hgWIsY4M

And then Gragas [chimes in](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L-LyFMCIpok) with All Chat:

https://media.giphy.com/media/cjSmUtihpYQeY/giphy.gif

Lies!

No one plays Karthus today. No one!
Because he's boring to play, at least for me. Just a suicide mage with some of the most delayed powerspikes in the game
he's not boring, you just lack imagination.
https://media.giphy.com/media/VvHuInLUolJde/giphy.gif

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=j97qrhxB,comment-id=000000030000,timestamp=2015-12-03T22:10:12.952+0000)
>
> he's not boring, you just lack imagination.

What I LACK is Revive...

> [{quoted}](name=Keevalroy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=j97qrhxB,comment-id=0000000300000002,timestamp=2015-12-03T23:55:58.482+0000)
>
> What I LACK is Revive...

{{item:3070}} {{champion:30}}
OH the TP+Revive homeguard.
I've been playing him a bit here and there. He's fun as hell, if not just so I can start the game off by reciting the intro monologue of Samurai Jack, replacing Aku with Karthus.

> [{quoted}](name=Excitidly Insane,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=j97qrhxB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-03T20:00:03.733+0000)
>
> Lies!
> 
> No one plays Karthus today. No one!

Karthus is basically my go to mid laner.  And I feel like I have my best games as him.  His design highlights my strength as a player but does not highlight my weaknesses so he is a good fit.

Although, in this new era of short games and a virtually non existent late game, he is a little bit more of a risky pick.
Confirmed
Fooolish Samurai!

Oh wow...clever upvote farming....

This could have been any champion but you chose Yasuo, who funnily enough is one of the few champions that can actually survive this situation by building up enough flow before Requiem hits.

I'm not sure if that's a compliment or an insult. I chose the gif because between me and a friend of mine, we've always wanted an Aku inspired Karthus skin and joked about how Yasuo would be the Samurai Jack of the rivalry, since both are usually mid lane champions.
That and of course the upcoming new season for the show got me excited.
It wasn't meant as an insult, i never heard about the show before, my bad.
Take it you didn't recognize this as being from the show "Samurai Jack". It only makes sense that he'd reference League of Legends own samurai in the text.
Yep, i'm from EU and never heard about this show, my bad.

Then you realized that enemy team have {{champion:16}}

{{champion:30}} {{item:3070}}
"R you gonna ult Karthus? R you gonna do it?"
I woulda upvoted for a samurai jack gif alone, the fact that it worked with the title just made it better
When suddenly {{item:3157}}

The foolish samurai would build AP, just to screw with me?
https://33.media.tumblr.com/cf6fd53c5e6d765c4f386c6f617a75e8/tumblr_inline_nyr1jxyce91tf0yl3_500.gif
"but you're Karthus with ult off CD" That isn't possible his ults cooldown is 50 minutes now thanks to all the cry babies.
How did samurai jack end? I don't remember what the later episodes were like

The final episode was just filler unfortunately. It never actually ended, or had a definitive ending. The good news is, it's airing for another season in 2016 on Adult Swim, under the original creator.

Im just gonna leave this here for all you Samurai Jack fans...
http://nerdist.com/genndy-tartakovskys-samurai-jack-to-return-in-2016/
Thank you.
On another note Samurai Jack reboot confirmed for adult swim soooooooooooooo. There goes my life
